definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: Currently I am an international student at Graduate School of Int'l Studies, Korea University, Seoul, Korea.
sentences.chinese: 我目前就讀於韓國高麗大學國際研究生院。

sentences.english: Liu Xiaofeng, 20, from Guangdong Peizheng College, has a younger sister.
sentences.chinese: 20歲的劉曉鳳就讀於廣東培正學院，她有一個妹妹。

sentences.english: Do you have any siblings studying in HKAC or HKAA?
sentences.chinese: 你有兄弟姐妹就讀於香港三育書院香港復臨學校？

sentences.english: Jong Un was reportedly educated at the International School of Berne, which he attended under a pseudonym
sentences.chinese: 據報道，金正雲在伯爾尼的國際學校以化名就讀。

sentences.english: Families with a younger brother, 12 years old, studying in the village on the heap in the third grade.
sentences.chinese: 斯朗曲措有一弟弟12歲，就讀日堆村小學三年級。

sentences.english: She currently pursues her first year bachelor music degree in Haute Ecole de Musique de Genève.
sentences.chinese: 她現就讀於日內瓦國立高等音樂學院，攻讀學士學位。

sentences.english: The program provides job training for people who otherwise could not attend college.
sentences.chinese: 該項目爲那些不能在學院就讀的人提供職業培訓。

sentences.english: She is an eighteen-year-old girl, in the third year a group of schools.
sentences.chinese: 她是一個十八歲的女孩，在高三一班就讀。

sentences.english: Which kindergarten your child is living in ?
sentences.chinese: 您孩子目前就讀於何所幼兒園？

sentences.english: Yang Sheng, 22, a marketing major at Shenzhen University, is one of them.
sentences.chinese: 楊盛，22歲，就讀於深圳大學市場營銷專業。

sentences.english: Three. My school is six in Xiamen.
sentences.chinese: 我現在就讀的學校是廈門六中。

sentences.english: I attended high school and college at the University of the Philippines and I graduated with a degree in Accountancy.
sentences.chinese: 我在菲律賓就讀高中及大學，並且得到會計學士學位。

sentences.english: Students receiving special education include those learning in the same class of formal regular junior and primary school students.
sentences.chinese: 特殊教育學生數中包括普通中小學隨班就讀的學生。

sentences.english: The 20-year-old is a sophomore at the prestigious Royal College of Music in London.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他在久負盛名的倫敦皇家音樂學院就讀二年級。

sentences.english: I am one go study the Nanyang teachers' college's big new student.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個就讀南陽師院的大一新生。

sentences.english: Many students save money by starting their education at a two-year public college, also known as a community college.
sentences.chinese: 許多學生爲了省錢通常先就讀兩年制的社區學院。

definition: the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
to read a book/to study/to attend school
student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
